20110127150540.000|20110127150541.000|CC1|NORMALLY, THAT WOULD TRANSLATE  
20110127150543.000|20110127150543.000|XDS|%    TITLE:   
20110127150541.000|20110127150543.000|CC1|INTO WARMER, DRIER AIR FOR MUCH 
20110127150543.000|20110127150544.000|CC1|OF THE UNITED STATES.

20110127150547.000|20110127150549.000|CC1|OCEAN, WE HAVE A COMPLETELY

20110127150551.000|20110127150553.000|CC1|KNOWN AS THE NORTH ATLANTIC     
20110127150553.000|20110127150556.000|CC1|OSCILLATION AND THAT MEANS THE  
20110127150556.000|20110127150557.000|CC1|SEA SURFACE TEMPERATURE BETWEEN 
20110127150557.000|20110127150559.000|CC1|THE EASTERN UNITED STATES AND   
20110127150559.000|20110127150602.000|CC1|NORTHERN EUROPE PLUMMET SO IT'S 
20110127150602.000|20110127150603.000|CC1|COLDER AS WELL AND TRANSLATES   
20110127150603.000|20110127150604.000|CC1|INTO PRECIPITATION THAT WOULD   
20110127150604.000|20110127150606.000|CC1|NORMALLY BE RAIN INTO SNOW.     
20110127150606.000|20110127150608.000|CC1|WE HAVE BOTH OCEANS DIPPING IN  
20110127150608.000|20110127150610.000|CC1|THEIR WATER TEMPERATURE AND SO, 
20110127150610.000|20110127150611.000|CC1|ESSENTIALLY, THAT MEANS THIS
